attributes.action: Publish the Sue Gray report in full regarding alleged Downing Street gatherings
attributes.additional_details: After many months of denying the fact gatherings ever took place, the Metropolitan Police have conducted their investigation into alleged Downing Street gatherings during COVID restrictions and have issued fines to senior government individuals such as the Prime Minister, Boris Johnson. At this point, the government should publish the Sue Gray report in full and release this to the public. We have so far seen a redacted report sparing many details, but the full report should now be published.
attributes.background: The Metropolitan Police have conducted their investigation into alleged Downing Street gatherings and have issued fines to senior government individuals such as the Prime Minister, Boris Johnson. At this point, the government should publish the Sue Gray report in full and release this to the public.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
